abstract.t: HTTP Streaming allows breaking the live contents or stored contents into several chunks/fragments and supplying them in order to the client. However streaming long duration and high quality media over the internet has several Challenges when we require the client to access the same media content with the common Quality experience at any device, anytime, anywhere. This document explores problem inherent in HTTP streaming. Several issues regarding network support for HTTP Streaming have been raised, which include QoS guarantee offering to streaming video over Internet, efficient delivery, network control adaptive and real time streaming media synchronization support.
